## PDF Files aller Slides:

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
list.files(pattern = "\\d{2}_.+\\.pdf$", path = "_site") |>
  stringr::str_match("\\d{2}_(.+)\\.pdf") |>
  apply(1, function(x){paste0("- [",x[2],"]","(",x[1],")")}) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")
  
```
